display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: The powerful stench of Jack in Irons is so bad it is physically painful.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
